skills.name: FOOLISH PRIDE
desc: • Deals magic damage to all enemies.
• Steal One Beneficial Effect, including Golden Effects for each Magic Burn on each enemy.

skills.name: GOD SPEED
desc: • Heal all allies based on your MAX HP.
• Inflict 2 Magic Burns on all enemies for 2 turns.
• Grant Increased Power and Fury Generation to all allies for 3 turns.

skills.name: FALL FROM GRACE
desc: Remove Perfect Immunity and all beneficial effects and inflict 3 Magic Burns on all enemies for 2 turns upon death. Revive with Perfect Immunity and Invincibility on self for 2 turns.
